Summary: was setting off to go hunting as i looked up i saw a shiny disc object.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There was one other sighting in Fresno on or around August 1st 2006
divs: Sighting Details At seven pm i set off to hunt some doves it was a clear day no clouds dusk was approaching, i was hunting on an indian reservation a friend lives on in northfork california, the direct center of california as i looked up to shoot some doves flying overhead i noticed a very bright object at approxomitly five thousand feet in the air i was at approxomitly twentyfive hundred feet elavation so the craft was three thousand feet from me approxomitly i looked at it for about five seconds and said to a friend it seems rather early for stars to be out she looked up and said that is no star, as i looked at again i saw that it was very shiny in appearance saucer type approxomitly one to two hundred feet in diamater as we looked at for a total of fifteen seconds it shot strait up in the air at an unbielivable speed, it was out of sight in less that two seconds, she could not belive her eys but i have seen them before while serving in the navy, and we had talked before about ufos, she was highly skepticle, but not any more, i have been intrested about ufos since childhood i am very noligable on the subject and am not prone to jumping to conclusions, the thing that i noticed the most was the brilliance of the object mirror like or polished stainless steel.
